title: Thick, handwriting type font - please identify
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828221501im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Cheese%20&%20Quackers,%202014%2011x17%20poster,%20OLG%20cropped_4448.jpg)

Please identify the font used here.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Cheese & Quackers, 2014 11x17 poster, OLG cropped.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828221501/http:/typophile.com/files/Cheese%20&%20Quackers,%202014%2011x17%20poster,%20OLG%20cropped.jpg) | 1.22 MB |
author: BBerndt

comments.content: Hand-done as all repeating letters are different.

Several of the Filmotype fonts might give the general flavor of the lettering.  
Filmotype Brooklyn [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/brooklyn/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828221501/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/brooklyn/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/brooklyn/") and a heavier version Filmotype Candy [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/candy/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828221501/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/candy/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/candy/")  
Filmotype Hemlock [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/filmotype-hemlock/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828221501/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/filmotype-hemlock/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/filmotype-hemlock/")  
Don
